name: Garden Growth (wtc654666)
description:
A plant is continuously growing. Guide its movement with WASD or arrow keys to dodge obstacles and achieve the greatest height you can for the plant! Also make sure to collect water droplets and ensure your plant does not dehydrate!

Version: v1.0 (may come back to it later to add some QOL or improve other elements)

A short game made for the 48 hour WolverineSoft 2022 DigiTurkey Game Jam where the theme was "Flourish".

Credits to my Umich teammates that were in my team for this Game Jam:

annajain, lucamar, mrjacob, winnieda

For other games in the 2022 DigiTurkey Game Jam, refer to:

https://itch.io/jam/wsdp-tgj-22
